snippet: Lotus and Kimi Raikkonen set the fastest lap time of the new season's first testing session in Jerez, Spain. Also, what do to about cars with "ugly" noses?
abstract: Lotus and Kimi Raikkonen set the fastest lap time of the new season's first testing session in Jerez, Spain. Also, what do to about cars with "ugly" noses?

headline.main: At Jerez Testing Session, More Questions Than Answers
